backup-codes.title: Backup Codes
backup-codes.description: Save these backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app.

regenerate.title: Regenerate Backup Codes
regenerate.description: This will invalidate your existing backup codes and generate new ones. Please enter your password to continue.

data.question-1: How do I record a new transaction?
data.answer-1: Click on ‘+ New Transaction’ in the dashboard or press Ctrl + N on the transactions page.
data.question-2: How do I create a budget?
data.answer-2: Go to Budgets → ‘New Budget’, select category, period, and limit. Progress is calculated automatically.
data.question-3: How do I work without bank integration?
data.answer-3: Import CSV under Import / Export or enter transactions manually. Manage account balances in Accounts.
data.answer-4: In the Family Plan, you can manage multiple users (Settings → Members & Invitations).
data.question-5: How do I reset the demo?
data.answer-5: Under Settings → Data & Privacy, you can select ‘Delete all local data’. Only your browser storage will be cleared.
data.question-6: How do I export my data?
data.answer-6: Under Import / Export, CSV exports as well as a full export (JSON) are available.
data.answer-7: DE/FR/IT/EN as well as Light/Dark/Auto. Switch at the bottom left of the sidebar or in Settings.

content-section.title: Content
content-section.help: Do you need individual help? Create a ticket – you’ll receive a reply by email.

message.placeholder: How can we help? Please be as specific as possible.

prompt.title: Enable Browser Notifications
prompt.description: Get notified about new updates even when you're on a different tab. We'll only show notifications when you're not actively viewing the app.
